text: inkara karanara'ona juthana jutha jahannama tarapha hankavamam avase, jyare te'o teni pase pahonci jase, tena dvara temana mate kholi nankhavamam avase ane tyanna dekharekha karanara temane savala karase ke, sum tamari pase tamara manthi payagambara nahata avya? Je tamari same tamara palanaharani ayato padhata hata ane tamane ajana divasani mulakatathi saceta karata hata? Te loko javaba apase ke ham, sacum che, parantu yatanano nirnaya inkara karanara'o mate sabita tha'i gayo
